name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellant, v. James T. TRUE

judges: Before ROBERTS, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, HUTCHINSON and ZARPALA, JJ.
NIX and McDERMOTT, JJ., did not participate in the consideration or decision of this case.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellant, v. James T. TRUE.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
The appeal is dismissed 303 Pa. Super. 601, 450 A.2d 199 as having been improvidently granted.
NIX and McDERMOTT, JJ., did not participate in the consideration or decision of this case.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: David E. Auerbach, Media, Donald A. Browns, Aston, for appellant.
D. Barry Gibbons, Media, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
466 A.2d 1346
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellant, v. James T. TRUE.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Oct. 26, 1983.
Decided Nov. 4, 1983.
David E. Auerbach, Media, Donald A. Browns, Aston, for appellant.
D. Barry Gibbons, Media, for appellee.
Before ROBERTS, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, HUTCHINSON and ZARPALA, JJ.
